alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 8:44AM CST until February 28 at 3:36AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Marengo Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 93.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday morning to a crest of 102.1 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
